/**
 * Generated by apidoc - http://www.apidoc.me
 * Service version: 1.0.0
 */
import anorm._

package test.apidoc.apidoctest.v0.anorm.parsers {

  import test.apidoc.apidoctest.v0.anorm.conversions.Standard._

  import test.apidoc.apidoctest.v0.anorm.conversions.Types._

  object Location {

    def parserWithPrefix(prefix: String, sep: String = "_") = parser(
      ipAddress = s"$prefix${sep}ip_address"
    )

    def parser(
      ipAddress: String = "ip_address"
    ): RowParser[test.apidoc.apidoctest.v0.models.Location] = {
      SqlParser.str(ipAddress) map {
        case ipAddress => {
          test.apidoc.apidoctest.v0.models.Location(
            ipAddress = ipAddress
          )
        }
      }
    }

  }

}
